item.title: Improving performance (and more) through load testing
item.description: Have you ever wondered how many active users your application can handle at the same time? If so, you are not alone. Here at Mattermost we are building a highly concurrent messaging platform for team collaboration that needs to potentially serve up to several thousands of users simultaneously. While standard functional testing (e.g. unit tests) is critical to verify correct behaviour of your application, it’s usually not sufficient to guarantee its performance at scale.
